gpt_comment: With consensus from the available sources, Brussels is set to bask in sunshine with average temperatures around 23.8°C, reaching a high of 29°C and dipping to a mild 17°C. There's a unanimous agreement on no rain, ensuring a dry and comfortable day. Perfect for indulging in a book at a park!
